name: Affordable Dumpster Rental
title: Data Analyst, UI Developer
description: I started at Affordable Dumpster Rental in sales. Through hard work, tenacity, and accountability, I was tasked with building a new market in Nashville. During this, my technical skills were highlighted and I was promoted to an Analyst position.
accomplishments: Promotion within 6 months of hire into technical position
Developed custom reporting for our dispatch, billing, and AR/AP teams to improve productivity by at least 50%
Designed and Developed a full web app for our hauler partners to improve sales numbers using the React framework and custom CSS.
